divs: Sighting Detailswhile working i looked up to see a rainbow cloud i was shocked. i know some things like this can be caused by ice in clouds but this didnt seem natural and the cloud would fade and get brighter. about ten minutes later i noticed the rainbow colored halo around the sun which stayed for a few hours two people i was with saw it talked to my brother who was in omaha at the time and he saw it and got some pictuers of it. where he was at there was no clouds which made it weird. two days before a man i work with saw the same thing while golfing in a near by city i have a hard time beliving this was natural but who knows.
Summary: strange rainbow halo around the sun and rainbow clouds
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ashland
This sighting has never been favorited.
